text: Phoebe Belle Cates (born July 16 1963) is an American model and movie actress. She is best known for acting in movies in the Gremlins franchise and for acting in the 1982 movie Fast Times at Ridgemont High. Cates was born on July 16 1963 in New York City, New York. She married actor Kevin Kline in 1989. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Models from New York City Category:1963 births Category:Living people
title: Phoebe Cates
